# ConditionsCheckerBuilder.Add method

Adds the specified Condition to the checker, with validation.

```csharp
public ConditionsCheckerBuilder Add(Condition condition)
```

## Remarks

It is recommended to only call this from an extension class or when adding a condition type not supported by the builder.
